column5: How long do you think until he gets a fine for selling the shark? http://www.thestar.com/news/gta/article/1305232--toronto-man-fianceed-out-of-mounted-shark-finds-new-home-for-grandpa-s-catch-online
Actually I just re-read it and you can sell sharks in Ontario, but not local species of fish . Still a cool story
Fined for possessing it, or selling a mount?
They should be a lot more worried about the sale of live Asian carp !!!!! And that's still going on .... Grrrrr

The fish was caught under a different country's sets of laws for capture, and taxidermy. He's perfectly legal to sell it here as it already passed border patrol years ago, legally. I doubt he concealed that thing in the vehicle to get across.  Cool story for sure.  If it were me I think the story would be more similar to Brad Paisley's "I'm Gonna Miss Her" lol
